Title: Long Weekend
Plot: It's Labor Day weekend and most of the men are sending their wives away for a few days. Don Draper's wife Betty is dreading the thought, as her father and his new girlfriend, whom she detests, will be staying with them. With the election approaching, the team at Sterling Cooper is gloomy since the Nixon campaign has not been following their advice. Roger Sterling was hoping to spend Friday night with Joan Holloway but having just seen the movie, The Apartment (1960), she is feeling a bit used. S
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes and offensive language
Writer: Bridget Bedard, Maria Jacquemetton, Andre Jacquemett
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Maggie Siff, Kate Norby, Talia Balsam, Ryan Cutrona, Allan Miller, Elizabeth Rice, Alexis Stier, Megan Stier
